Description.Name: Automation
Description.Details: Many of the Argo's Mech Bay systems used with sophisticated Star League era automation. Bringing that even partially back online is a substantial force multiplier to Yang's skills. Mechbay Automation requires lots of maintenance and adds +4 Techs.

AssignedCastDescription: You want to speed things up around here, give me the resources to get these machines back online. Sure glad the pirates didn't find this equipment, it'll make me look like a miracle worker.
